title: So Much More Than a $156K Pay Day: How Levi’s GranFondo Is Reviving American Pro Road Racing
content:
Keegan Swenson and Lauren Stephens win a massive $25,000 each in what might be the most lucrative road race in North America.

Read the full article at So Much More Than a $156K Pay Day: How Levi’s GranFondo Is Reviving American Pro Road Racing on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
